indicator.description: Does the company measure and monitor its scope 3 emissions through business travel?
Does the company have a climate change risks and opportunities management process?
Does the company have a policy or strategy to reduce greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions?
Does the company have programs or initiatives to reduce greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions?
Does the company monitor and measure their GHG emissions (scope 1 & scope 2)?
Does the company have programs or initiatives to reduce any types of waste?
Does the company have a policy or strategy to reduce waste?
Does the company have a policy or strategy to reduce overall energy usage?
Does the company have programs or initiatives to reduce overall energy usage?
Renewable energy consumed as a percentage of total energy consumed for the fiscal year
Does the company have an environment management system ?
Does the company have products or services which are considered as environmentally friendly?
Does the company have initiatives or programs on community services?
Percentage of CSR Spend to average profit for 3 years
Does the company have a strategy or policy on training and career development?
Does the company have initiatives or programs for training and career development?
Company's average employee performance appraisal rate
Percentage of employees receiving training to total employees
Does the company conduct employee satisfaction survey?
Does the company have a strategy or policy on health and safety?
Does the company have initiatives and training programs on health and safety?
Does the company have a health and safety team?
Does the company have safety measures such as fire alarms, smoke alarms and fire extinguishers?
Employees fatalities for the year
Does the company have a strategy or policy on fair compensation?
Does the company have an employee grievance redressal mechanism in place?
Percentage of trade union representatives
Employee turnover percentage of field employees during the year
Employee turnover percentage of non-field employees during the year
Does the company have a policy on diversity and inclusion?
Does the company have programs on diversity and inclusion?
Percentage of women in senior management
Percentage of women employees to total employees
Does the company grant maternity leave to its employees?
Does the company grant paternity leave to its employees?
Percentage of differently abled employees to total employees
What is the average percentage difference between the remuneration of the women and men (excluding contract employees) for top management level employees?
What is the average percentage difference between the remuneration of the women and men (excluding contract employees) for all employees (excluding top management)?
Does the company have a strategy or policy on human rights?
Does the company have a policy on sexual harrassment?
Does the company have an internal quality management system ?
Does the company have a strategy or policy on product or service quality?
Does the company have initiatives or programs for product or service quality?
Does the company have a platform for customers to register complaints, feedback and suggestions?
Does the company issue a code of conduct for its vendors/suppliers?
Does the company conduct client satisfaction survey?
Does the company have any initiative, programs for improvement of business ethics and prevention of bribery,corruption and/or money laundering?
Does the company have a policy on business ethics and anti-corruption?
Does the company have a business continuity plan?
Does the company have a whistle blower protection policy?
Percentage of independent board members at the end of the fiscal year
Percentage of non executive board members at the end of the fiscal year
Average attendance percentage for all board meetings conducted in the fiscal year
Does the company have a policy on board gender diversity?
Number of board members who are female at the end of the fiscal year
Does the company have a risk management committee?
Does the company have a remuneration and nomination committee?
Does the company have an audit committee?
Does the company have a Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) committee?
Does the external auditor issue an unqualified opinion on the company's financial statements at the end of the fiscal year being evaluated?
Does the company report its environmental, social and corporate governance performance?
Does the company map the United Nations Sustainable development Goals (UN SDG) ?
Does the company have a do no harm strategy?
